website_summaries.verdict: This budget-friendly cake stand skips the traditional cutesy look with a fresh, modern design that keeps the focus on the cake.
pros: Created by Ashley Rose, Founder and Editor of Sugar & Cloth DIY and Entertaining Blog
Melamine cake stand with detachable base
cons: Base is easy to screw on crooked

customer_reviews.title: Love these little containers
customer_reviews.text: I have previously ordered these little containers. Rather than use them for food, since they have to be hand-washed, I have measuring tape, needles, clips in them. Now they are on sale and a great buy for organizing your "stuff."
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Mapes

customer_reviews.title: Grooms cake for 150
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our grooms cake. When i first got it in i was concerned if it would tip but it worked well, was easy to clean and store
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy S

customer_reviews.title: The sugar & cloth a Marble was chipped and was not good quality. I seeing better quality
customer_reviews.text: It got here on time. The sugar & cloth a Marble was chipped and was not good quality. I seeing better quality. I don’t like to give bad reviews but I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about these products and company. First of all the price point for what you get is amazing! These bowls and spoons are so sweet and great for parties or a scoop of ice cream at night for the kiddos. The packaging is beautiful, the color is perfect. Love love
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cute for cupcakes.
customer_reviews.text: Used for dessert table to hold cupcakes good quality just a little smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not my taste
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feels cheaper than the cost also it was dirty but it came in a fancy box so there’s always that
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made and durable..
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the word "melamine" fool you - this is one high quality, durable cake stand. I have several pieces of department store melamine dinnerware and this surpasses those in terms of quality. The melamine base is thick and sturdy and attaches/detaches easily to the top for easy storage. I expected the faux marble top to look cheap but it is anything but - it looks elegant and adds subtle interest to the display. The stand arrives well packaged in a beautiful box suitable for gift giving - a housewarming, shower, etc.. I had not heard of Sugar & Cloth before but will absolutely look at other pieces in this line given the quality of this cake stand.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Display your finest works of (cupcake) art.
customer_reviews.text: These are an unusual party item, you can display three cupcakes on three different levels, just as you would on a much larger scale with full-size cakes. They are made of melamine plastic with a look that resembled real marble. They would be nice for a couple of little girls to have a tea party. For that matter, use them for whatever mini-purpose you or your child can come up, whether cupcakes are involved or not. I was stumped myself. Although they are cute, these cupcake stands are pretty much useless as far as presentation or function.
customer_reviews.author: Honey🍯

customer_reviews.title: These do not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. You will not be disappointed. Not only are they the perfect gift because they come in this really cute box/packaging but these work in so many applications. 1. I write/photograph cookbooks and my initial thought was to get these for photo props. They are perfect! 2. I prefer non breakable items for easier storage. These foot the bill and are easy to assemble. 3. I love the faux marble, very authentic. 4. I'm also loving the different heights and these are going to work great for an appetizer buffet presentation. Again Perfect! *sorry amazon distorts the photos
customer_reviews.author: BeachBrights

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of dishes when I was a kid
customer_reviews.text: These cups and spoons take me back to my childhood when we had dishes like this in all kinds of colors. They are a cute size for serving a special desert or just fun to get out and have a cup of fruit out of. They are versatile and easy to clean. My only issue is that the design that was put on them didn't quite match up, the line was off a little on each one. Other than that, these are great and will see a lot of use in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Yoda OK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but....the Base Locks On Crooked
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty & substantial cake stand. This is not disposable quality. My problem with it is that when you lock the square base it has to turn & then it is off-center from the top – looks very chintzy – like you bought a second & it’s a second because the base is crooked. If the base was round, this would not matter & would not look odd. OR they should have produced it with that turn of the locking base in mind. If you don’t lock the base, the top is going to tip over dumping whatever you have on it.
customer_reviews.author: Katawampas

customer_reviews.title: Great for use over and over, just as sturdy as a ceramic bowl.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute set for serving pudding, sorbet, or many other treats. It’s also great for portion control. It looks like marble, but you can tell by touch that it’s not. Doesn’t feel like plastic or ceramic, more in between the 2. They will feel like quality though, not cheap feeling or looking. Judging by the listing, they expect them to be single use. Why in the world anyone would toss these after one use is beyond me. I’ve used mine weekly for over a month, washing in the sink after each use, and they look like new. At the price, they are a bit pricey for repeat use, for single use the price is crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Bargn Hntr

customer_reviews.title: Check the edges. . .  .Some may be rough and require sanding.
customer_reviews.text: This Sugar and Cloth 4 piece marble melamine dessert set looks quite nice. Melamine is defined by wiki as an “organic compound with the formula C3H6N6. This white solid is a trimer of cyanamide, with a 1,3,5-triazine skeleton. It is widely used in production of certain plastics, e.g. Formica.” It is not actual marble. It has a plastic feel to it and it looks a lot heavier than it is. The only problem is that one of the spoons was not as smooth and rounded off. I do not think it would cut your lip, but it could depending on the person, pressure, and angle. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but I changed it a bit
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but would like it better if the podium stayed attached. I realize they did that for storage purposes, but people kept bumping it off with cupcakes on it! I actually super glued the podium on so it doesn’t happen in future. Perhaps a slide in and lock style attachments? It is still beautiful. Easy to rinse off under sink and dry. I store it upside down in cabinet and it doesn’t take up much room, even though I’ve glued podium to the bottom. I also love to use it as a stand to show off some of my pottery pieces I’ve made when I have a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Cornett-McVay

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It's a really cute desert set. I've never really had any dishes in this material before, but I like it so far. Very visually pleasing. I got it cuz I have a friend who like cute dessert cup items, not necessarily desserts, but they look cute in these cups. There is this savory custard that is a side, but not dessert, that looks great in these little dessert cups. I like them for small ices or yogurt sides. Very pretty..
customer_reviews.author: Mooncatx

customer_reviews.title: Great for puddings, ice cream, etc. but not Jello!
customer_reviews.text: Look much nicer than pictured. When I first ordered these, my GF was not too thrilled over the design. Once they arrived she loved them - actually ordered another set. The marble finish is printed on and will scratch - I found this out when I accidentally scratched one with a fork. The spoons are a bit of a fail. They should have the marble print on the handle at least. They look and feel like heavy plastic disposable spoons. Great for pudding, etc - but NOT Jello - Jello stains the cups and spoon edges.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Drew

customer_reviews.title: Nice for informal dining
customer_reviews.text: First the word Marble is about the texture and not what the cups and spoons are made of. There is nothing in the packaging or on this site to tell me what they are made of but I am assuming some sort of plastic. Other than the material, these are nice desert cups with spoons.They would be good for a pudding or jello or maybe a small diced fruit salad. Good size for desert and they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Mania

customer_reviews.title: Cupcake Stands
customer_reviews.text: These are just the weirdest.The marble look really does look like marble. But the bottom of the stand doesn’t look like marble. It looks cheaper, like plastic. They come apart, which is fine for storage. The platforms are really only large enough for a cupcake. I thought I could use them as slightly odd drink coasters, but they are just too tippy for that purpose. I guess I would just need more cupcake holders or more sturdy elevated coasters.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jane

customer_reviews.title: Stylish dessert cups
customer_reviews.text: The Sugar & Cloth Piece Spoon Set, Dessert Cups are very stylish with nice materials . The cups hold about 4 ounces and are and great for desserts like custards and jellos. The cups and spoons appeared to be dish-washing machine safe as I have tried them out with mine with no problems. These cups make a much nicer appeals as compared to my plain clear glass dessert cups. Great for parties serving as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetman

customer_reviews.title: Showstopper cake stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a modern looking marble melamine cake stand. I like that it comes in two pieces so you can store it easily and there is no danger of breaking the base. It will look good with any dessert, cake or pie. We have suppers at church and I am proud to show of my baking skills with this showstopper cake stand. Do not put in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cupcake stands
customer_reviews.text: These are plastic cupcake stands, made to look like marble. They are three different sizes. They work well for a small display or a photo or something like that. I'm not sure they have a practical daily use in a home kitchen, but a person could decorate with them, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Nelson

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable little desert cups with a marble appearance on the outside and fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable little desert cups with a marble appearance on the outside. They are a subtle grey and white blended design. Spoons come with them. They are marketed as desert cups but also work great for other things like snacks for small children because they are skinny at the bottom and easy to grip. They are durable and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Fun desert cups that look great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, casual desert cups. They feel like hard plastic, but look like marble. Spoons are also hard plastic but look good and work perfectly with the cups. We use these for ice cream, custard, and pudding. It's fun to have special desert cups in the house. Nice cups that we enjoy using!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and tacky looking
customer_reviews.text: Even though I'm familiar with melamine products, I truly expected these to look a lot nicer than they did in person. We make a lot of little desserts that would fit nicely in these, but they just feel cheap and weird. Especially the spoons. Almost the kind of thing you would use once and throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: great cake stand, cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute cake stand, and doesn't feel like marble but is still thick enough it doesn't look cheap when displaying a cake. It's relatively sturdy, but you'll want to use your extra hand to stabilize the base while cutting cake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A contemporary design--looks like marble! It's pretty heavy
customer_reviews.text: A contemporary design--looks like marble! It's pretty heavy, too. Great for any dish of anything; not just for cake. I like some elevation on a table or buffet--mixes it up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: sunday

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than the photo.
customer_reviews.text: This dessert cup and spoon set looks better in person than in the photo. We got these to match some other Melamine products. They hold up well, although they aren't dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and somehow "old fashioned" looking. Nice for things like mousse.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Clucker

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: We love these little dessert cups and spoons. They are very cute and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't look new when arrived
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like someone had bought it, used it for a cake then returned. Oily fingerprints on bottom of stand and an oily stain in the box.
customer_reviews.author: bluecurtains

customer_reviews.title: Sugar & Cloth Set of 3 Mini-Cupcake Melamine Stands
customer_reviews.text: Mini Cupcake Stands A group of three melamine display stands which attractively displays pastries, candies, finger sandwiches, small cups of various dipping sauces, etc. The 4 1/4 inch diameter tops lock into the three varying height bases so the top cannot be inadvertently dislodged. The three heights adds visual interest so even simple items look more appealing. The plastic is finished nicely – no obvious seams—and the stands have a quality appearance with the thin top with the faux-marble finish being surprisingly heavy adding substance to the group. I appreciate the extra cushioning provided in the box because it while stored between uses it will prevent damage to the pieces. Excellent set.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty portion control
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice looking little dessert cups. I wasn't sure what to expect, but am very pleasantly surprised. These are a nice weight, not at all cheap and plasticky feeling. The best thing about these little cups is the built in portion control. These are the perfect size for one "official" serving of ice cream. Easier to keep portions in check if the container is the right size, and it doesn't hurt at all if that container is also cute. I would love to see these in larger packages. They would be great for family gatherings too. No worries about anyone dropping a delicate cup. Easy to wash and store.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: The pictures make these look way bigger than they actually ...
customer_reviews.text: The pictures make these look way bigger than they actually are. They can hold maybe one normal size cupcake and possibly three little ones on the biggest size stand. These are such an odd shape for being a stand if they were bigger they would look so cute but in order for them to serve any purpose at all you would have to put a larger plate on top of the stand and then you wouldn’t be able to actually see the stand anyways. Unfortunately these did not look as pictured or described.
customer_reviews.author: KWJ

customer_reviews.title: Unique dessert holder
customer_reviews.text: I love the unique look of these desserts pedestal. They have a modern color and shape. I have used these a handful of times for displaying of desserts. It gave height to some of the featured desserts. It was just the esthetic I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: DebraS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Sugar & Cloth's Modern Square Cake Stand (SC16CSMBL01) is a nifty cake stand. It comes apart and is easy to store and for the price point it looks really nice. The feel of it is a bit off and I wish it were a bit more smooth. However, it is sturdy and well made. It's an awesome piece to have for your cakes and other food presentations. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: midnight122

customer_reviews.title: Good looking way to display goodies
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand for displaying cupcakes, little quiches, or any kind of individuality portioned hors d’oevre. I wouldn’t recommend using it for anything that needs to be cut, though it seems to be stable; it’s too lightweight, and I wouldn’t trust it not to tip under the right pressure. I’m looking forward to taking it to parties and pot lucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Could have been nicer
customer_reviews.text: These are cute melamine dessert cups and spoons. They are dishwasher safe too! (NOT microwave safe) The size is nice for a pudding or fruit cup too. But I found that the inside white finish got marred very quickly. The way they did the pattern of marble doesn't work as an illusion - the white lip at the top makes them seem more plastic and emphasizes that they're fake.
customer_reviews.author: CCE

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how tiny these are. The bases attach to the top and are sturdy. They are meant to be a base to put a plate on top of . I had thought that you were meant to place the cupcake directly on the top of these but that must not be correct because each is only big enough to hold 1 mini cupcake
customer_reviews.author: HHK

customer_reviews.title: No Thank You
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I'm not impressed with these stands. There are three stands and I'm not sure if an average size cake would fit in these. However, I do think they would work well for cupcakes and other edible goods. Beyond that, these stands are very sturdy and take a second to snap together.
customer_reviews.author: Ymjauthor

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding cupcakes and other things!
customer_reviews.text: Sugar & Cloth is making some super fun party ware! The products say they are disposable, but they are fairly strong and seem like they will hold up well to repeated usage. These cupcakes stands are fun, but I am actually using them to display products for photos and they are perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Meijer Bjorn

customer_reviews.title: Great set for entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little set that has corresponding other dishes available (I have the oval trays with the same marble finish and LOVE them!). Sold, medium weight. White base with marble top that is a separate piece that twists right to lock into place, or left to remove for cleaning and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver DeMille, TJEd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: When I saw cupcake stand I thought YES. When it arrived I was confused. However, i had a better use. I used them to elevate small bottles of makeup for a display. The weighted stand and round dish are elegant, they bring a touch of class, they are simply PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Donna Padgett

customer_reviews.title: A Cute Dessert Cup and Spoon Set
customer_reviews.text: The set is very cute and fun to use at dinner parties. It is especially handy if you have made the dessert and want to show it off. This is not a necessary item for life but I think it is attractive and fun to use in situations with company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Both the cups and the spoons are really nice. Not flimsy at all. Quite substantial. I have seen several items by Sugar & Cloth and am impressed with the quality of their products. They are also in a really nice box, making them a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: reg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cake stand
customer_reviews.text: This 12" x 12" stand is the perfect size for most square or round cakes. The hard plastic is marblized, which makes it a little more stylish. Storage is easy because it comes in two parts. Obviously, it's much lighter and more portable than glass. It's a very nice cake stand.
customer_reviews.author: K K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and practical
customer_reviews.text: Very cute dessert set; goes with any dinnerware color, e.g. tablecloths. Do not put in microwave or oven because of melamine, but dishwasher safe. Great for serving pudding, flan, ice cream in small portions etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kodi

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love these as much as the other marble look items from this brand, but these are still nice and work well for many applications, not just cupcakes. Definitely a win for those that love the marble aesthetic (aka my teen daughter).
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

customer_reviews.title: They're decent quality for what they are. My mom ...
customer_reviews.text: They're decent quality for what they are. My mom uses them to hold pictures of grandchildren on window sill.
customer_reviews.author: banana wind

product_meta.title: Sugar & Cloth Marble Melamine Modern Square Cake Stand
product_meta.description: Style:Marble Cake Stand| Size:Cake StandShowcase cake or desserts with this sturdy marble melamine cake stand. Cake stand comes in two pieces for easy storage in both cabinet or fridge! Designed by Ashley Rose, Founder and Editor of Sugar and Cloth. From party plates to serveware & champagne coupes, Sugar & Cloth is the perfect way to dress up your table (and avoid the dishwasher)!
feature_bullets: Chic styles to add flair to your next cocktail party, shower, brunch, or holiday gathering

When Ashley designed Sugar & Cloth Marble Melamine Modern Square Cake Stand, she wanted to make sure that they didn’t take up a ton of space in your kitchen. Just twist off the top of the cake stand and store in the china cabinet, kitchen cabinet and even your refrigerator!
As a gentle reminder, if you must reuse your cake stand, please remember to hand wash them only, as our BPA-free material is not dishwasher safe
Created by designer Ashley Rose, Founder and Editor of top DIY and entertaining blog, Sugar & Cloth

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
